summary: When metal-worshipping fanatics abduct his son, a father unleashes his dormant destructive power, as his naked rage transforms the once-feeble flesh into a grisly symbiosis of metal and tissue. Who dares to defy the ultimate body-hammer?
cast: Tomor√¥ Taguchi|Shin'ya Tsukamoto|Nobu Kanaoka|Sujin Kim|Hideaki Tezuka|Tomoo Asada|Iwata|Keinosuke Tomioka|Torauemon Utazawa|Min Tanaka
title: Tetsuo II: El cuerpo de martillo
